title.rendered: These are the new numbers of their channels

content.rendered:
Movistar is currently preparing for this great change of dials, which will take place from next June 2. Channels 1 to 10 remain intact, but then you will be able to see how Movistar’s grid will look after this big change.

This is how the Movistar Plus+ dials will look

All the channels will continue to be sorted by categories so we can easily find them, but most of them are going to be on a different dial. Movistar puts at our disposal a page with the dials so that we can find the dials once the change occurs next week, but here you will already be able to see all the new numbering.

Movie Channels

Movistar has a large number of channels designed to broadcast the best cinema all day long, several of them thematically. From dials 11 to 29 we will find all these channels, although with one exception: the channel of La Resistencia 24 H is located on dial 21.

  • Dial 11: Premieres by M+
  • Dial 12: Premieres 2 by M+
  • Dial 13: PopUp by M+
  • Dial 15: Classics by M+
  • Dial 16: Action by M+
  • Dial 17: Comedy by M+
  • Dial 18: Drama by M+
  • Dial 19: Cinema Ñ by M+
  • Dial 20: Fest by M+
  • Dial 21: The 24H Resistance
  • Dial 22: TCM
  • Dial 23: hollywood channel
  • Dial 24: XTRM
  • Dial 25: Sundance TV
  • Dial 26: Dark
  • Dial 27: We are
  • Dial 28: cinema
  • Dial 29: Paramount Network

New Movistar Plus+ Cinema dials

series channels

If already with the movies we have more than enough options, with the series more or less the same thing happens. In this case, the series channels will be located between dials 30 and 47and here we can find both some of Movistar’s own and other options such as Calle 13 or AMC.

  • Dial 31: Series by M+
  • Dial 32: Series 2 by M+
  • Dial 33: FOX
  • Dial 34: AXN
  • Dial 35: TNT
  • Dial 36: ComedyCentral
  • Dial 37: 13TH Street
  • Dial 38: Cosmo
  • Dial 39: AMC
  • Dial 40: AXN White
  • Dial 41: syfy
  • Dial 42: Thirteen
  • Dial 44: Energy
  • Dial 45: FDF
  • Dial 46: neox
  • Dial 47: A3 Series

This is how the dials of the series channels will look

Sports channels of all kinds

We take a leap in category and we are going to focus on Movistar’s sports offer, which is not exactly scarce. From dials 49 to 79 we will be able to see all kinds of sports, from football to golf, through the Bulls or F1, for example.

  • Dial 49: MULTISPORT
  • Dial 50: #GO for M+
  • Dial 51: They #V for M+
  • Dial 52: LaLiga by M+
  • Dial 56: Champions by M+
  • Dial 59: Sports by M+
  • Dial 62: Golf by M+
  • Dial 63: DAZN F1
  • Dial 64: DAZN 1
  • Dial 65: DAZN 2
  • Dial 66: eurosport 1
  • Dial 67: Eurosport 2
  • Dial 69: GOAL
  • Dial 70: Telesport
  • Dial 71: Hunting and Fishing
  • Dial 72: Iberia TV
  • Dial 73: Bulls
  • Dial 74: Real MadridTV
  • Dial 75: Barca TV
  • Dial 76: HorseTV
  • Dial 77: NauticalChannel
  • Dial 78: GarageTV
  • Dial 79: UBEAT

documentary channels

That documentaries are boring is already a thing of the past. Movistar Plus+ has several very interesting channels to watch documentaries, not only focused on nature, but even on the criminal world. we will find them between dials 80 and 88.

  • Dial 80: NAT GEO
  • Dial 81: NG Wild
  • Dial 82: History
  • Dial 83: Discovery
  • Dial 84: ODYSSEY
  • Dial 85: AMC Break
  • Dial 87: DMAX
  • Dial 88: AMC Crime

Two of the channels available in the documentary offer.

lifestyle channels

Of course, in the Movistar channel lineup there is no shortage of lifestyle channels, where we will find a very varied and different selection of content between the channels. All these channels will be located between dials 90 and 97.

  • Dial 90: Kitchen room
  • Dial 91: From home
  • Dial 92: DKISS
  • Dial 93: divinity
  • Dial 94: Not going
  • Dial 95: MEGA
  • Dial 96: BeMad
  • Dial 97: have

Channels for the little ones at home

If there are children in your house, you should know very well that on Movistar television there are quite a few options for them to enjoy content suitable for their ages. Between channels 109 and 119 we will be able to find the best children’s series on the platform.

  • Dial 109: Nick Ukraine (temporary channel)
  • Dial 110: Baby TV
  • Dial 111: Disney Junior
  • Dial 112: panda channel
  • Dial 113: Nick jr
  • Dial 114: Nickelodeon
  • Dial 115: dreamworks
  • Dial 116: Disney
  • Dial 117: Boing
  • Dial 118: Clan TVE
  • Dial 119: ETB3 (only in the Basque Country)

Sponge Bob is one of the children’s series available.

music channels

If you don’t feel like watching anything, but you do want to listen to all kinds of music, the Movistar Plus+ music channels are a great option. Whether for yourself or to liven up a party, between dials 120 and 126 you will find the best music.

  • Dial 120: MTV Spain
  • Dial 121: MTV 00s
  • Dial 123: Mezzo
  • Dial 124: Mezzo Live
  • Dial 125: Stingray Classica
  • Dial 126: sun music

Informative channels

To be informed of all the news (both in Spain and in the world) it never hurts to take a look at the channels focused entirely on giving information. All of them will be placed on the Movistar grid between channels 127 and 149.

  • Dial 127: 24 hour channel.
  • Dial 128: BBC World
  • Dial 129: CNN Int.
  • Dial 130: foxnews
  • Dial 131: euronews
  • Dial 132: Al-Jazeera
  • Dial 133: France 24 (FR)
  • Dial 135: 1 + 1 International
  • Dial 136: CNBC Eur.
  • Dial 137: TV5 World
  • Dial 138: Bloomberg
  • Dial 139: The Bull TV
  • Dial 140: TV business
  • Dial 141: cnc world
  • Dial 142: CGTN Spanish
  • Dial 143: phone
  • Dial 144: C. Stars
  • Dial 145: Chilean TV
  • Dial 146: Our TV
  • Dial 147: Cubavision
  • Dial 148: TeleSUR
  • Dial 149: EWTN

regional channels

Almost all the regional channels are not going to change dials (most are located in the first dials), but those that were from 150 onwards do change slightly. From now on, these will be located from dial 151 to 166.

  • Dial 151: Canal Sur Andalusia
  • Dial 152: TVG Europe
  • Dial 153: Canal Extremadura SAT
  • Dial 154: TV3CAT
  • Dial 155: ETB Basque
  • Dial 156: Aragon TV Int.
  • Dial 157: Telemadrid International
  • Dial 158: 8 TV (national signal)
  • Dial 163: Super 3 / 33 (only in Catalonia)
  • Dial 164: Esport3 (only in Catalonia)
  • Dial 165: 3/24 (only in Catalonia)
  • Dial 166: Betevé (only in Catalonia)

Things to keep in mind after the numbering change

Now that you know all the new numbering, it is worth pointing out some extra things. The first is that the channels Playboy and Fútbol Replay will be on channels 190 and 199, respectively. All channels blocked at the platform level (as is the case precisely with Playboy) will continue to be blocked despite the change of dial. However, if we had any other channel blocked will have to lock it again through the Settings and Channel Blocking section. Also, if you have favorite channel lists active on your decoder, you must deactivate the list and activate it again so that the new dials are updated.

All this numbering change will take place completely automatically for all users from day 2, except those who have a satellite decoder (not iPlus). For these, the change will occur at a later date, although these users have the possibility to do it themselves by following these steps:

  • Press the custom key of command
  • Select option 5 “Channel memorisation” and press OK
  • Select option 6 «automatic storage» and press OK
